author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
Check out the Museum Collection Helm of Sauron: https://www.budk.com/Lord-of-the-Rings-Museum-Collection-Helm-of-Sauron-52793/52793.html

Product Description:
A terrifying vision of power and darkness, the War Helm of Sauron™ from The Lord of the Rings™ Museum Collection is a meticulously crafted replica of the helm worn by the Dark Lord himself during the prologue of The Fellowship of the Ring™. Cast in reinforced polyresin with a corroded, heat-discolored finish, the helm features a genuine leather-lined and padded interior. Every surface is hand-finished to match the original Weta Workshop prop, capturing the vine-like engravings, iron texture, and six menacing spikes that crowned Sauron in battle. Standing 30" tall, this officially licensed collector’s replica is mounted on a custom wood and polystone display stand. It includes a Sauron-scale One Ring™ replica and a fabric war banner bearing the Eye of Sauron, along with a certificate of authenticity. Individually serial-numbered,
title: Helm of Sauron Museum Collection Unboxing
